metadata.name: Black BAYC 6731 NFT.love hoodie
metadata.description:
The love for NFT's is being reflected IRL by our merch collection.

Our BAYC 6731 is the very first NFT we have used to proudly present our collection to the world. Initially stitched on the backside of a jacket to be worn during the reveal of our CryptoBerliner #507 by Crypto Citizens in Berlin on 20th April 2022.

Now it found the place on the very first black hoody - being the 1st minted wearable on our smart contract.

#NFTlove

attributes.value: Underneath the white printed token ID above the woven NFT.love label holding the link to this NFT. Applied by heat press, withstands bending, domestic washing, dry cleaning and ironing.
QR code on label is linking directly to etherscan.io so the printed token # can be entered and verified.
